"'''Something's Been Making Me Blue'" is a song by the British rock band Smokie from their 1976 studio album Midnight Caf√©''. It first came out in January 1976 as a single and later appeared on the album, which was released in April.
Background and writing
The song was written by Nicky Chinn and Mike Chapman and produced by Mike Chapman and Nicky Chinn.
